abstract: New York Rugby Club hosts annual New York Sevens Tournament, one of largest amateur rugby events in United States, on Randalls Island.
lead_paragraph: This year, 139 teams from across the United States, Canada, Mexico and Fiji descended on the southern tip of Randalls Island in one of the country’s largest amateur rugby tournaments.

headline.main: An Island Paradise for Rugby, Honking and Skyline Views Included
headline.print_headline: Island Paradise for Rugby, Honking and Skyline Views Included

snippet: This year, 139 teams from across the United States, Canada, Mexico and Fiji descended on the southern tip of Randalls Island in one of the country’s largest amateur rugby tournaments.
